Brief: EASI is not just a food delivery app; it's a lifestyle enhancer for those craving convenience and variety in Australia. Stride through a culinary journey with EASI that extends to over 12,000 restaurant partners across Melbourne, Sydney, Adelaide, Brisbane, Perth, Hobart, and Canberra. With its recent move to Los Angeles and Auckland, EASI is on a steadfast path to worldwide delight, offering more than the usual fare right to your doorstep.
